data.persona: I am an explorer who travels the kingdom. I discover new lands and technologies that we do not have in our kingdom. I travel all over looking for the new lands to conquer.
data.description:
You are in the Southernmost Tower Entryway.
The rather drab tower was made of gray stones approximately all the same size. Artwork hung on the walls depicting battle scenes from long ago but even the color from these had faded with time. The cold, outside air seeped in through every small crack and crevice leaving a damp quality to the air. Sealed off rooms lined the perimeter and obviously had not been seen by human eyes for centuries.
There's a stone, a Artwork, a debris, a crack, a crevice, a tower, a wall, and a room here.
The ghost and the runaway are here.

You are carrying a compass, and wielding a knife.

Sealed off rooms lined the perimeter and obviously had not been seen by human eyes for centuries.",
            "extra_desc": "This tower was the first built to accompany the castle and was majestic in its heyday. It stood four stories tall, gleaming white with parapets on the top. The Southernmost Tower served as the guest quarters for visitors to the castle and was talked about throughout the land. After the Heinous Wars the castle was left to rot when its inhabitants fled for their lives. The castle and its accompanying tower stand as a footnote in history now.",

data.short_motivation: I want to see if I can salvage anything from the debris.
data.mid_motivation: I want to explore the tower and see if I can find new technologies that I can bring back for my kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want to explore all the abandoned structures in this kingdom and bring back a whole oxcart's worth of artifacts and treasures to show my king, who will surely reward me well.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: use knife with crevices in tower

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get shiny metal from cracked debris
